text: 50:36 how do I do this in windows? I can't even properly paste the stuff i just copied and nothing is working

That's a very big security risk you're taking if you only use an API and you don't know how the API is working on the background, API's are the new thing that hackers are interested in because of the lack of security of the API's.
The first thing that I want to know of any API that I'm going to use is how it works in the background or at least how I can make use of the API in a safe way keeping hackers out.
Get the notes and code for this course here: https://github.com/craigsdennis/intro-to-apis-course/blob/master/course-notes.md
Really very nice and humbled by attending the class
